snippet: The United States Central Command said the name was meant to reflect “the unwavering resolve” of the nation and its partners to eliminate the militant group.
abstract: Defense Department chooses Operation Inherent Resolve as name for American military strikes against the Islamic State; says title reflects 'unwavering resolve' to eliminate militant group.
lead_paragraph: The United States Central Command said the name was meant to reflect “the unwavering resolve” of the nation and its partners to eliminate the militant group.

headline.main: Finally, a Name for ISIS Strikes: Operation Inherent Resolve
headline.print_headline: Finally, a Name for ISIS Strikes
